SEARCH
Package oogasalad.editor.view

Class EventsSectionBuilderTest

java.lang.Object
oogasalad.editor.view.EventsSectionBuilderTest
@ExtendWith(org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationExtension.class) class EventsSectionBuilderTest extends Object
Tests for EventsSectionBuilder using TestFX and Mockito. Verifies UI component creation and interaction logic for adding, removing, and selecting events by their String IDs.

    (package private) void

    (package private) void

    Tests that selecting different items in the event list triggers the selection handler with the correct event ID string each time.
    (package private) void
    testRemoveButtonRemovesSelectedEvent(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
    Tests that selecting an item in the event list and clicking the "Remove Event" button triggers the remove handler.

  • Method Details

    • start

      @Start private void start(Stage stage) throws Exception
      Initializes the JavaFX stage, mocks, resource bundle, and builds the UI. This setup runs before each test method.
      Parameters:
      stage - The JavaFX stage provided by TestFX.
      Throws:
      Exception - If mock initialization fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown() throws Exception
      Cleans up resources, specifically closing Mockito annotations context. This runs after each test method.
      Throws:
      Exception - If cleanup fails.

    • lookup

      private <T extends Node> T lookup(String query)
      Helper method to look up a node within the built UI using a CSS query. Includes waiting for FX events to ensure UI updates are processed.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The expected type of the Node.
      Parameters:
      query - The CSS selector query.
      Returns:
      The found Node cast to type T.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the node is not found.

    • testComponentStructure

      @Test void testComponentStructure()
      Tests that the essential UI components (TextField, ListView, Buttons) are created and present.

    • testAddButtonAddsEvent

      @Test void testAddButtonAddsEvent(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)
      Tests that typing an event ID and clicking the "Add Event" button triggers the add handler with the correct event ID string.
      Parameters:
      robot - TestFX robot for UI interaction.

    • testAddButtonDoesNotAddEmptyEvent

      @Test void testAddButtonDoesNotAddEmptyEvent(org.testfx.api.FxRobot robot)

      Parameters:
      robot - TestFX robot for UI interaction.
